basicInfo.name: Dragon
basicInfo.flavor: After presiding over the rivers for years, the Dragon eventually moved to the sky and now commands the clouds, winds, and rain. In times of drought, it brings rains that bless the land with abundance.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 90% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 90% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Purple Clouds
Skill 1.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 245% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 75% chance to inflict Shock. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 245% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.name: Dragon Scales
Skill 2.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 85% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 75% chance to inflict Poison. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 85% of Physical Attack.

Passive.name: Lightning Shower
Passive.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants Physical Attack Boost. [Always Active]
 - Self
 - Grants All Damage Nullification. [Ends After: Taking 3 Hit(s)]

profile.story:
The Dragon is a sacred beast that has lived in Aisha since ancient times.
Since time immemorial, it has upheld the will of the heavens and protected the humans of Aisha.
All dragons were once imugi: to attain dragonhood, imugis must acquire a Dragon Bead after long years of ascetic practice while abstaining from violence and slaughter.
After ascending to dragonhood, they gain immense spiritual powers and settle in rivers or lakes, governing and protecting the lifeforms around them.

basicInfo.name: Dragon
basicInfo.flavor: While on its journey to enlightenment, the Dragon attained the power to rule rivers. Were it not for the Dragon Emperor, it could have even ruled the sea as well. Thus, the dragon contented itself with commanding the rivers alone.

Normal Attack.desc:

 - Increases Damage: To 80% of Physical Attack.

Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 220% of Physical Attack.

 - 65% chance to inflict Poison. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 75% of Physical Attack.

 - Self

basicInfo.name: Dragon
basicInfo.flavor: After eons of ascetic practice, the imugi acquired the Dragon Bead and ascended to dragonhood. Now, it rules over the watery depths of the lake and all that swims beneath its surface.
